ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The “Virogenesis” project receives funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation program under grant agreement No. 634650.

sec.title: Authors’ contributions
sec.p: BDR and CM contributed to the writing of the manuscript and creating of figures and additional material. BDR, CM, XC, MC, MS, JM, and MP discussed the contents of the manuscript and contributed to editing and revision. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: No financial or non-financial competing interest existed for any one author during the writing of this manuscript.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Reported studies do not involve human participants, human data or human tissue.
